item.description:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("spam") && c.playerRights >= 3) { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(6); Connection.removeNameFromBanList(playerToBan); c.sendMessage(playerToBan + " has been Spammed!."); c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.SPAMMED.Com", 12000);
